basis.GameHandler

    Package Description
    ants  
    basis  

    • Uses of GameHandler in ants

      Classes in ants that implement GameHandler 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AntGameServer
      This class implements a game server specific to the game of ants.
      Constructors in ants with parameters of type GameHandler 
      Constructor and Description
      AntGameManager(GameHandler gameHandler, java.util.ArrayList<AntMapTemplate> maps)
      Creates a new game manager for an ant game.

    • Uses of GameHandler in basis

      Classes in basis that implement GameHandler 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  GameServer
      The game server is the main class of the project.
      Fields in basis declared as GameHandler 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private GameHandler GameThread.gameHandler
      The handler used to notify the server when the thread has terminated its work.
      protected GameHandler GameManager.gameHandler
      The handler used to notify the server when new games are created.
      Constructors in basis with parameters of type GameHandler 
      Constructor and Description
      GameManager(GameHandler gameHandler)
      Creates a new game manager for 4-bot games.
      GameManager(GameHandler gameHandler, int nbPlayers)
      Creates a new game manager from a fixed number of bots.
      GameManager(GameHandler gameHandler, int nbPlayersMin, int nbPlayersMax)
      Creates a new game manager from a ranged number of bots.
      GameThread(Game game, GameHandler gameHandler)
      Creates a new game thread from a game instance.
